name: Arduino
body:
### Andy's Arduino Code
This is a collection of software components for use with Arduino.  Most of the content here I've collected from other sources and put my own polishes on (e.g., reformatting, adding comments, using
meaningful variable names, making more OO).  Where I've taken code, I include a link to the original source and where possible, I have notified the original authors of my changes.  I'm putting this here in hopes someone else will find this useful.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
